input: user: A cat lounging lazily in front of a window basked in warm indoor lighting, surrounded by soft pillows. The cozy setting should evoke relaxation and contentment.
coverage: Prompt: Capture a serene cat lounging lazily, its fur illuminated with a soft glow from warm indoor lighting. Position the cat in front of a wide window, the blinds drawn to filter the afternoon sun. Scatter plush, inviting pillows around the scene, creating a cocoon of comfort. The room should feel cozy and intimate, with gentle shadows cast across the surfaces. The image should exude an overwhelming sense of relaxation and contentment, inviting viewers to experience pure tranquility.
validityText:
The input description is in English, adhering to the specified language requirement. The description has a word count of 23, which is well within the 80-word limit set by the specification. Additionally, the description is presented as a single paragraph. All of these checks indicate full compliance with each component of the specification.
